summary: A data container that holds the results of a diffusion scheduler step, including the sample for the previous timestep to feed back into the denoising loop and the modelâ€™s prediction of the original (denoised) image.
business_intent: Standardize the return values of the DDIM scheduler so downstream components can reliably retrieve the next input sample and optionally use the predicted clean image for monitoring, guidance, or further processing in image generation pipelines.
